name: gyazo-clipboard
title: Gyazo Clipboard
description: Upload Screenshot To Gyazo From Clipboard
author: qaynam

commands.name: gyazo-raycast-plugin
commands.title: Gyazo Raycast Plugin
commands.subtitle: Gyazo Raycast Plugin
commands.description: Raycast Plugin for Gyazo. Upload screenshot from clipboard to Gyazo. Requires Gyazo API key. Set your Gyazo API key in the preferences.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
